Train from Aigle to Val D'Illiez.  Taxi from Val D'Illiez, approx. CHF 50.  There is also a bus service but it is not very frequent.

Skiing in Winter.

Note the connection between Les Crosets and Champoussin is closed due to a dispute between the two communities (as at December 2008).  It is not possible to ski conveniently between the two areas, however it is possible to get from Champoussin to Les Crosets if you can tolerate a 30 minute uphill walk.  Go to the top of the Aiguille des Champeys chair lift and then follow the piste uphill to the south-west.  After 30 minutes of mainly uphill walking you will reach a blue run that goes down to Les Crosets.

value: Restaurant at the Hotel des Portes du Soliel
